messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
What kind of person are you, to be
drawn here by the scent of flowers?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
It was a strong Trainer who was drawn
here by the scent of flowers!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
By the way, have you collected new
apps from the Pokétch Company?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
You came back to me because you
couldn’t forget the smell of flowers!
